name: Fritzi is leaving
description:
Story

Fritzi always wanted to see more of the world than just their home village in rural Germany. Today is the day they will finally make this dream come true. Now the only thing that’s left is saying goodbye to friends and family. But not everyone is happy with Fritzi’s plans. In the ensuing conversations the player learns more about Fritzi’s relationships with the villagers and and tries to win them over to support Fritzi’s plan to leave the village.

Controls

Navigate Menu
W + S, E to confirm

Movement:
A + D

Talk, pickup/interact with highlighted objects:
E

Take photos at “sparkly” spots
F

Confirm Picture
Mouse click

Pause menu:
Esc

Team

PROJECT LEAD, GAME DESIGN, AUDIO DESIGN, FONT DESIGN
David

GAME ART
Lara

GAME PROGRAMMING
